lead_paragraph: LIPPMAN--Bert J. 35 years ago - May 27, 1981 - you left us. We think of you every day. You are always in our hearts. Your tribe in increasing. We love you so much. Ruth, Jane, Robin, Chuck, Jessica, Stefan, Amy, Bradley, Danielle, Lucy, Leo, Teddy, and Will 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  LIPPMAN, BERT J

snippet: LIPPMAN--Bert J. 35 years ago - May 27, 1981 - you left us. We think of you every day. You are always in our hearts. Your tribe in increasing. We love you so much. Ruth, Jane, Robin, Chuck, Jessica, Stefan, Amy, Bradley, Danielle, Lucy, Leo, Teddy, and Will 1/3
